channel.title: ants on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in ants on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-07
item.description: Samsung takes a stab at its own immersive metaverse store (3 minute read) Samsung 837X is an immersive metaverse experience that will be open in Decentraland for a limited time.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-09
item.description: Reddit to reportedly tokenize karma points and onboard 500M new users (2 minute read) Reddit is planning to convert its users' karma points into Ethereum-based tokens.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-05-19
item.description: Google’s Project Starline is a ‘magic window’ for 3D telepresence (1 minute read) Google’s Project Starline uses a combination of specialized hardware and computer vision technology to create life-sized 3D images of people.
